message.body: How's your week gone? Where are you next week? Can we talk re my having Aethel again? I love having him hang out with me.
Week going well. Canton, MA next week. Still need to pack.
Aethel with me? I can pick him up today.
Yeah, sure. If it would make you happy. He's been a very good dog, gets wound up but has been calming down very quickly. Friends came over last night and he was very well behaved.
Good. Can i drive up to collect him about 2 pm? I have an errand in bryn mawr.
